questions.question_text: After loading Workforce data from external systems, which statement describes actions you can take to make adjustments to loaded data and then calculate compensation expenses? Choose the best answer.

choices.D: In Workforce, if you change both the selected benefit option and the rate, when compensation expenses are calculated, the value will be based on the benefit option's default value.
choices.A: In Workforce, change properties such as salary grade and FTE, and then calculate salary, benefits, additional earnings, and taxes based on assumptions in Planning.
choices.C: Change loaded benefit information in Workforce such as options for medical benefits and then launch the compensation data business rule to calculate the updated benefit data.
choices.B: Change loaded salary information in Workforce and then run the data map for Compensation Data to calculate the updated benefits.

discussion.content:
A B E
You can import metadata from a flat file in a comma-delimited, tab-delimited, or other format. These artifacts are supported in the imports:
✑ Dimensions
✑ Smart Lists
✑ Exchange rate tables

questions.question_text: Which three artifacts can be imported from a flat file? (Choose three.)

choices.D: 3 BSO cubes (2 required for the modules +1 custom BSO cube), 2 ASO cubes
choices.A: 3 BSO cubes (1 required for the modules +2 custom BSO cubes), 2 ASO cubes
choices.B: 2 BSO cubes (1 required for the modules +1 custom BSO cubes), 2 ASO cubes

questions.question_text:
What would be the recommended module-based cube architecture for a company wanting to enable Financials and Capital, as well as create a Detailed Sales
Forecasting cube with complex allocations and calculations, corresponding sales reporting cube, and consolidated reporting cube? (Choose the best answer.)

discussion.content: Answer should be ACE. OFS-Forms Entry and OFS_Input are not members of Plan Element.

Selected Answer: ACE
ACE is correct

questions.question_text: Which three Financials members within the Plan Element dimension allow for forecast and plan data entry? (Choose three.)

choices.B: It helps eliminate the impact on query thresholds and improving wait times.
choices.A: It automatically merges comments, attachments, and supporting detail when mapping a cube for reporting.
choices.D: It enables you to apply row suppression at the database level instead of the application level.
choices.C: It allows you to continue using the application while Smart Push runs in the background.

questions.question_text: Which two are benefits of enabling Use Database Suppression in Smart Push? (Choose two.)
